nodes.text: Ankori-7 was a planet located within the Ankori system of the Expansion Region.

Following the Clone Wars, the world was chosen by Senator Bail Organa, the Prince of Alderaan, as the secret hiding place of his traitorous sister-in-law, Deara Antilles. Antilles had been discovered communicating with Darth Vader and attempting to turn over Organa's adopted daughter Leia to the Galactic Empire.
